text: avaru adarolage citkarisuvaru; nam'modeya! Nam'mannu (illinda) horatege, navu i hinde madiddakkinta bhinnavada, satkarmagalannu maduvevu. (Avarodane helalaguvudu); navu nimagondu ayusyavannu nidiralillave? (Adaralli) upadesa svikarisuvavanu upadesa svikarisabahudittu. Mattu eccarisuvavaru nim'ma balige bandiddaru. Idiga saviyiri, akramigalige yaru sahayakarilla
